Title: Let it Cook - Agent Skills aka Skills.md in VS Code
Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
Agent Skills are folders of instructions, scripts, and resources that GitHub Copilot can load when relevant to perform specialized tasks. Agent Skills is an open standard that works across multiple AI agents, including GitHub Copilot in VS Code, GitHub Copilot CLI, and GitHub Copilot coding agent. Let's cook!

Links: Docs: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/customization/agent-skills Agent Skills: https://agentskills.io
